data.convo: Excuse me . Could you tell me how to get to the library ? Of course . It's on Memorial Avenue . On Memorial Avenue ? Right . You know where that is ? I'm afraid I don't . I'm quite new in town . Well , do you know where the post office is ? No , I don't . But I do know where the shopping mall is . That won't help us . Let me see now ... Why don't you follow this street , Elm , until , you get to the second stoplight . Well , thank you very much , I hope I can find it .
